name: BuildHOPE
0:
”Alexa, open build hope”
”Alexa, open build hope and encourage me”
”Alexa, open build hope and tell me something encouraging”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: build hope
des:
Hope is an optimistic state of mind that is based on an expectation of positive outcomes with respect to events and circumstances in one's life or the world at large. As a verb, its definitions include: "expect with confidence" and "to cherish a desire with anticipation."
Need Encouragement & some hope , just visit "Build HOPE"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
